programme.desc: Aps dois dinossauros desenvolvidos pelo exrcito americano atacarem uma pequena cidade das montanhas, cabe ao xerife local encontrar uma maneira de impedir que as criaturas destruam tudo a sua volta.

programme.title: O Som do Trovo, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: No ano de 2055, o esporte predileto dos ricos viajar no tempo para caar dinossauros. A diverso tem apenas uma regra: proibido trazer do passado qualquer lembrancinha, viva ou morta, j que isto geraria uma srie de reaes que modificaria o presente

programme.title: Tempestade de Meteoros, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Para a astrnoma Michelle Young, um evento celestial nico se transforma em um pesadelo quando milhares de meteoros rompem a superfcie da atmosfera e bombardeiam a cidade de San Francisco.

programme.title: 2:22- Encontro Marcado, (2017, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A vida de um homem sai dos trilhos quando um padro ameaador de eventos se repete exatamente da mesma maneira todos os dias, terminando precisamente s 2:22.

programme.title: Uma Histria Americana, (1991, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Duas mulheres, uma negra e uma branca, em 1955 Montgomery Alabama, devem decidir o que faro em resposta ao famoso boicote aos nibus liderado por Martin Luther King.

programme.title: Drages para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as guas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.

programme.title: Crimes de Rua, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Dois policiais, um com uma arma e outro com os punhos, arriscam tudo para tornar o bairro livre de crimes e drogas, derrubando o mais poderoso chefo das ruas

programme.title: Famlia de Policiais II: Uma Quebra de Confiana, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: O inspetor Paul Fein volta sua antiga vizinhana para desvendar um crime: a mfia russa suspeita de ter assassinado um padre. Desta vez, ele precisa enfrentar fantasmas do passado, sob o risco de ter a sua famlia na mira dos bandidos.

programme.title: Amor e Balas, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson um policial escolhido pelo governo dos Estados Unidos para cuidar de uma misso mortal na qual deve viajar meio mundo para capturar uma bela amante de um Czar submundo do crime.

programme.title: Malcolm X, (1993, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: O lder afro-americano Malcolm X tem o pai assassinado pela Klu Klux Klan e sua me internada por insanidade. Preso aos 20 anos de idade, Malcolm se converte ao islamismo e passa a pregar seus ideais.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: No fim do sculo 19, Wong Fei-Hung enfrenta o saque estrangeiro na China. Com a violncia crescendo, at tia Yee questiona os ideais ocidentais diante do poder do Kung Fu.

programme.title: Conspirao Fatal, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de ser preso e ter sua reputao na Fora Area manchada, um piloto veterano foge da cadeia e parte em busca do verdadeiro criminoso. Ele, ento, descobre uma conspirao terrorista em andamento e somente ele poder evitar um desastre.

programme.title: The Music of Silence, (2018, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme biogrfico sobre o tenor e msico italiano Andrea Bocelli. Apesar de ter nascido com um grave problema de viso que terminar em cegueira, Bocelli supera todos os tipos de obstculos, guiado por grandes ambies em relao sua paixo, a msica.

programme.title: Grandes Olhos, (2015, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Pintora e defensora das causas feministas, a norte-americana Margaret Keane enfrenta um de seus maiores desafios ao levar ao tribunal o prprio marido. Em um perodo em que o reconhecimento de um trabalho feminino era difcil.

programme.title: Abrao, (1993, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Deus decide fazer uma nova promessa humanidade depois das calamidades que culminaram no desastre da Torre de Babel. Abrao escolhido para torna-se o Pai das Naes e a histria da redeno se inicia.

programme.title: O Milagre, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Um novo professor enviado para trabalhar numa pequena vila que sequer possui uma escola. L, ele logo faz amizade com um simptico homem deficiente. O professor rene os moradores para construir uma escola ali para ensinar as crianas e seu novo amigo.

programme.title: O Que Fazer?, (2014, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Depois de saber que s tem 90 minutos de vida, por conta de um aneurisma no crebro, um homem infeliz quer fazer as pazes com todos aqueles que foram magoados por ele.

programme.title: O Fsico, (2014, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: No sculo XI, um rfo carente viaja para a Prsia para estudar medicina com um renomado curandeiro.

programme.title: Lute Por Sua Vida, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme focado em um grupo de pessoas obcecadas por um livro de autoajuda. medida que o livro se torna mais popular, ele afeta uma estranha variedade de personagens. Suas vidas se cruzam, gerando mudanas que duraro para sempre.

programme.title: Em Busca de um Milagre, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: O mundo do doutor Luke Matthew desaba quando ele perde o amor de sua vida e se torna pai na mesma noite. Quando ele contrata Sage como a nova bab, os dois comeam a perceber que a melhor forma de remdio deixar ir.

programme.title: Bandits, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: The suave Joe and his hypochondriac partner Terry have escaped from prison. Cutting a swath from Oregon through California, these fugitives rob banks in order to finance their scheme for a new life south of the Border.

programme.title: Original Gangstas, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: A fast-paced Action-Thriller about adults living in a crime-ridden area. They are tired of being bullied, and take matters into their own hands to rid the town of the criminals.

programme.title: MAFIA, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: In the 1970s, a fierce crime boss (Ving Rhames) wreaks havoc on the streets. Detective Womack (Pam Grier) decides to put an end to this organized crime even if it means breaking the law.

programme.title: Pain & Gain, (2013, Crime)
programme.desc: When an ambitious group of personal trainers go after the American Dream, they get caught up in a criminal enterprise that goes horribly wrong. Now, living large will take everything they've got in this unbelievable and outrageous true story.

programme.title: Thief, (1981, Crime)
programme.desc: Michael Mann directs this stylishly photographed action-packed drama that stars James Caan as a master safe cracker who is planning his last heist for the sake of a woman (Tuesday Weld).

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.title: Pain & Gain, (2013, Crime)
programme.desc: When an ambitious group of personal trainers go after the American Dream, they get caught up in a criminal enterprise that goes horribly wrong. Now, living large will take everything they've got in this unbelievable and outrageous true story.

programme.title: Get Shorty, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Golden Globe winner John Travolta stars with Gene Hackman, Danny DeVito and Rene Russo in this wildly popular comedy of a gangster who turns into a big-time producer after he travels to Hollywood to collect a debt from a down-and-out filmmaker.

programme.title: The Good, The Bad And The Ugly, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood portrays the invincible 'Man With No Name' in lethal pursuit of $200,000 in Confederate money alongside Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach in this renowned, influential, and classic cinematic western directed by the great Sergio Leone.

programme.title: 12 Angry Men, (1957, Courtroom Drama)
programme.desc: Eleven jurors are convinced that the defendant is guilty of murder. The twelfth has no doubt of his innocence. How can this one man steer the others toward the same conclusion? Henry Fonda and Lee J. Cobb lead the all-star cast in this classic!

programme.title: Barefoot In The Park, (1967, Romance)
programme.desc: Robert Redford is Mister Straight. Jane Fonda is his new wife. As the ecstasy of the honeymoon gives way to the reality of setting up housekeeping in a five-flight walk-up, the harmony of marriage turns to comical discord.

programme.title: Clueless, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Emma, (1996, Romance)
programme.desc: Emma is a mischievous beauty who sets up her single friends, making a hilariously tangled mess of their lives until she herself falls in love. Gwyneth Paltrow stars in this beloved adaptation of Jane Austen's novel.

programme.title: BrideandPrejudice, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: Based on Jane Austen's classic novel Pride And Prejudice, with a musical twist, sparks fly, and cultures clash between a small-town beauty and a wealthy American. An acclaimed treat from director Gurinder Chadha.

programme.title: Mansfield Park, (1999, Romance)
programme.desc: When a spirited young woman is sent away to live on the great country estate of her rich cousins, she's meant to learn the ways of proper society, but instead enlightens them with her own wit. Based on the beloved romantic-comedy Jane Austen novel.

programme.title: From Prada to Nada, (2011, Romance)
programme.desc: Nora and Mary are spoiled sisters living the good life in Beverly Hills until their loving father unexpectedly dies.

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas, (1995, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage garnered a Best Actor Oscar for his hauntingly disturbing portrayal of a suicidal alcoholic who falls for a compassionate Las Vegas prostitute (Elisabeth Shue) in one of the year's most critically acclaimed films.

programme.title: A Month By The Lake, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: An attractive older guest at the Lake Como Resort has her eye on a handsome, well-to-do bachelor, and will go to outrageous lengths to reel in her wealthy catch.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: Paul Newman earned an Oscar nomination plus Best Actor honors from the National Society of Film Critics and New York Film Critics Circle for his portrayal of Sully, a likeable working stiff whos made a lifetime of bad decisions.

programme.title: Big Night, (1996, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: In a restaurant run by two Italian immigrants, the tables sit empty despite the extraordinary talents of Primo the chef (Tony Shalhoub, Monk) and the ambitious efforts of his brother Secondo (Stanley Tucci).

programme.title: Little Man Tate, (1991, Drama)
programme.desc: A single, working-class mother can't give her musically, scientifically and emotionally gifted 7-year-old son the support and stimulation he needs--and neither can the director of a school for exceptional children, who takes him under her wing.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: Paul Newman earned an Oscar nomination plus Best Actor honors from the National Society of Film Critics and New York Film Critics Circle for his portrayal of Sully, a likeable working stiff whos made a lifetime of bad decisions.

programme.title: Big Night, (1996, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: In a restaurant run by two Italian immigrants, the tables sit empty despite the extraordinary talents of Primo the chef (Tony Shalhoub, Monk) and the ambitious efforts of his brother Secondo (Stanley Tucci).

programme.title: The Limey, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, an extremely volatile and dangerous ex-con travels from England to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his estranged daughter's "accidental" death.

programme.title: Nick of Time, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Gene arrives home after attending his ex-wife's funeral. Soon, his daughter is kidnapped. He is given a gun and told that if he hasn't killed that person in one hour and fifteen minutes, his daughter will be killed.

programme.title: Rollerball, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan stars as a rollerball champ in this fast-hitting, action- packed glimpse of a future where a brutal, no-holds-barred sport takes the place of war, and murder is just part of the game.

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Eat My Dust!, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: Darlene's into going fast, Hoover's into Darlene, but when they both get into a red-hot race car, the reckless fun accelerates into a trunk-full of hot pursuits.

programme.title: Love and Death: Love and Death, (1975, Comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen invades the spirit of Tolstoy in this hilarious spoof of 18th Century Russia, when Napoleon is preoccupied with perfecting his pastry and before Wellington markets his beef.

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: Rockers, (1978, Documentary)
programme.desc: Night Flight Presents: Starring Leroy 'Horsemouth' Wallace and Richard 'Dirty Harry' Hall; ROCKERS is a story of oppressed Jamaican musicians getting even with the 'mafia types' in the business

programme.title: Coffy, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Pam Grier stars as Coffy, a one-woman vigilante force, out to even the score with those who have hooked her sister on drugs. Coffy uses her sex appeal and an assortment of weapons to rid the streets of society's scum in this cult classic.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah gives the Big Five one last chance to redeem themselves in a five-on-two tag team duel where Yugi and Joey take on the entire Big Five!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five concentrate their attack on Joey so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone! Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Joey are near the end of the line!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Joey has no monsters to defend with! Joey's luck has run out, so it's time for him to rely on skill!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the critical Battle City showdown with the fate of the world at stake: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! If Yami Yugi loses, Yugi is taking a permanent vacation into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik proves his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi's cards can withstand its assault, but a gift from Kaiba may turn the duel around

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Yugi at the end of his ropes and the maniacal Marik waging all-out war, can Marik's oldest friend reach Marik in time to help him come to his senses before his insanity overwhelms him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: With Law's true ambitions revealed, Doflamingo goes into action in order to protect his criminal operation! Caesar slips away from Luffy leaving him to face off with the frigid Monet, and the rest of the crew face down a menacing dragon!

programme.sub-title: A Mastermind Underground! Doflamingo Makes His Move!

programme.title: Luffy goes down fast after Monet puts a chill into him, and Trafalgar Law makes a desperate attempt to reclaim his heart during an electric battle with Vergo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Dies from Exposure?! The Spine-chilling Snow Woman Monet!

programme.title: Smoker attacks Vergo for assaulting his men, Luffy meets something strange in the trash heap, and a flashback reveals the true depths of Caesar's madness!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fists Collide! A Battle of the Two Vice Admirals!

programme.title: Luffy befriends a dragon that used to be a human boy, and Captain Smoker continues his brutal battle with the villainous Vergo!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy hitches a ride on a dragon, Mocha tries to keep the Master's candy away from her friends, and Zoro pits his steel against snow in a battle with Monet!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Fight in a Blizzard! The Straw Hats vs. the Snow Woman!

programme.title: It's Zoro vs. Monet in a duel to the death - or is it? Tashigi comes to lend a hand, and she'll need to bring her full might to compensate for Zoro's weakness! Meanwhile, Mocha is running out of options for keeping the candy away from the children.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showing Off His Techniques! Zoro's Formidable One-Sword Style!

programme.title: Chopper, Nami, and Robin watch in horror as Mocha makes a heartbreaking sacrifice in a courageous attempt to save the lives of her friends!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To Save Her Friends! Mocha Runs at the Risk of Her Life!

programme.title: Brownbeard heroically attempts to expose Caesar as a villain, the horrific truth about Punk Hazard is finally revealed, and Luffy puts the hurt on his gaseous enemy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Brownbeard in Grief! Luffy Lands a Furious Blow!

programme.title: Luffy makes Caesar pay for his crimes against the children, and Smoker risks his life for a chance to see Vergo fall in battle!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Surprising Outcome! White Chase vs. Vergo!

programme.title: Law reaches the end of his epic battle with Vergo, and Luffy looks to land a devastating final blow on the murderous gasbag Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Caesar's Defeat! The Powerful Grizzly Magnum!

programme.title: Word of Luffy and Law's alliance spreads throughout the world, Chopper and Brook race to stay ahead of the deadly gas, and Joker sends a team to rescue Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The laboratory crumbling around them, and time running out, Luffy, the Straw Hats, the G-5, the children and all the others make a final desperate sprint towards the one exit left off the island - but Joker has one more trick up his sleeve.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: As the Straw Hats and company flee the crumbling laboratory, Caesar's desperate act of vengeance thwarts Joker's plan to forever silence his enemies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Critical Situation! Punk Hazard Explodes!

programme.title: Franky continues his battle with Buffalo and Baby 5, Nami uses a mighty gust of wind to save the children from a deadly cloud of gas, and Usopp takes a shot at capturing Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A dragon regains his boyish form, a noble warrior once feared dead makes a shocking resurrection, and bitter enemies set aside their differences to enjoy a well-deserved feast!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Touching Reunion! Momonosuke and Kin'emon!

programme.title: The weary marines and the rescued children get teary-eyed as they say goodbye to the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Law enters into treacherous negotiations with Joker!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It's Time to Say Goodbye! Leaving Punk Hazard!

programme.title: On their way after having set out from Punk Hazard, the Straw Hats find out their next destination - just as a huge wave comes crashing down on the Sunny! But it's rough sailing for the G-5 as well, as Donflamingo arrives on the scene and wreaks havoc!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The G-5 Wiped Out! Doflamingo's Sudden Attack!

programme.title: Aokiji's intercession saves Smoker and sends Joker off to rethink his strategy, leaving unanswered questions about Aokiji's current status. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats catch their breath as the Sunny makes its way through the rough seas of the New World.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Smooth seas stretch out before the Straw Hats as they leave Punk Hazard far behind -- but while they fear Donflamingo's return and prepare to face him, another foe lies in wait, whose powers could be their downfall!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Caesar Goes Missing! The Pirate Alliance Makes a Sortie!

programme.title: Breed has Luffy, Trafalgar, and Chopper firmly in his grasp with his Peto-Peto power! Breed dreams of a world in which he has enslaved all the humans, but Luffy's stubborn persistence and unwillingness to cooperate may have landed him in hot water.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Dies at Sea?! The Pirate Alliance Comes Apart!

programme.title: Dressrosa! Luffy and the Straw Hats divide into teams and set about their business on this passionate, enchanting island! But here, in the heart of enemy territory, danger lurks around every corner. Luffy and the others encounter a mysterious blind man.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explore! A Kingdom of Love and Passion - Dressrosa!

programme.title: Out and about in Dressrosa, Luffy and his team encounter a mysterious and powerful blind gambler - and run into trouble while his shocking powers distract everyone! Meanwhile, a major event in the Colosseum draws huge crowds.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Full of Enthusiasm! The Corrida Colosseum!

programme.title: Zoro, Sanji, and Kin'emon strike off in search of the thieving fairy who has taken Zoro's sword, but Sanji finds himself mesmerized by the beautiful dancing of a gorgeous Dressrosa woman - with a deadly secret!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Dangerous Love! The Dancer Girl - Violet!

programme.title: Luffy enters the Corrida Colosseum in order to compete for Ace's Flare-Flare Fruit! But with the mightiest warriors of the New World assembled and standing in his way, the competition will not be easy. The first stage of the competition is a battle royal.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Formidable, Unknown Warrior! Here Comes Lucy!

programme.title: While the deadly battle of Block A winds down, all the onlookers in the stadium are shocked to discover the secret identity of the winner! Meanwhile, Luffy's cover may be blown as another voice from the past returns.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy meets an unexpected acquaintance from the past, Bellamy, who seems to be up to no good! Meanwhile, Caesar Handover Team encounters a snag when they learn just how dangerous Green Bit is!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fateful Reunion! Bellamy the Hyena!

programme.title: The battle heats up and the widely despised Bartolomeo takes the ring! But he'll have to contend with both the Prodence Kingdom contingent, and Dressrosa's own local favorite, Bellamy! From up above, Luffy risks having his cover blown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Super Rookie! Bartolomeo the Cannibal!

programme.title: Don Chinjao continues to provoke Luffy, hoping to gain revenge against the grandson of his sworn enemy, Garp! But as the argument continues, Luffy risks having his cover blown, and his identity revealed! Meanwhile, the battle in Block B rages.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big Names Duke It Out! The Heated Block B Battle!

programme.title: The battle for Block B hits a crescendo as King Elizabello II prepares his devastating King Punch! But as the powerful attack becomes imminent, the Prodence Kingdom faction unravels! All that may be pointless, though.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Blow! The Astonishing King Punch!

programme.title: As the handover team approaches Green Bit, they are attacked by the fearsome fish that live off the coast of Dressrosa. But that's the least of their problems as they find the bridge to Green Bit has collapsed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fighting Fish Strike! Across the Deadly Iron Bridge!

programme.title: Zoro tracks the thief who stole his sword - and learns about a danger facing the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Law, Usopp, and the others arrive at Green Bit only to find it inhabited by strange creatures, and swarming with the Navy soldiers!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: All but done for, Sanji is trapped by Violet and her crew when she suddenly changes her mind and mysteriously turns on her own men! Meanwhile, Robin and Usopp come face to face with the Little People known as the Tontatta Tribe.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Unknown World! The Tontatta Kingdom!

programme.title: Sanji gets in touch with Law in order to share a shocking secret - that could unsettle the Straw Hats' plans in Dressrosa for good! Meanwhile, Luffy's Block C battle begins, but will his Gum-Gum powers give him away?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Stratagem of the Century! Doflamingo Makes His Move!

programme.title: Brotherhood of the Wolf, (2001, Foreign Action & Adventure)

Quando o implacvel Lord Rincon e sua gangue MS-13 recrutam Miguel, de 10 anos, para trabalhar como um de seus entregadores de drogas, Lucas, irmo mais velho de Miguel e que tambm trabalha para o bandido, est desesperado para manter o garoto seguro. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jean-Claude Van Damme, David Castaeda, Elijah Rodriguez, Nicholas Sean Johnny, Charlie MacGechan, Joana Metrass, Dean John-Wilson, Jim Caesar, Kerry Bennett, Uriel Emil Pollack Diretor: Lior Geller

programme.title: Distrito 13 - Ultimato, (2004)

Gneros: Crime Elenco: Philippe Torreton, David Belle, Cyril Raffaelli Diretor: Patrick Alessandrin

Diretor: Michael Caton-Jones

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo - T01E37
programme.desc: 2007. Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. programme.title: Pacific Rim
programme.desc: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in an effort to save the world. Starring Charlie Hunnam, Diego Klattenhoff, Idris Elba.

programme.title: Alien
programme.desc: Crewmembers aboard an interstellar freighter encounter a monster that crawls around their ships dark corridors and service ducts as it kills them one by one. Starring Tom Skerritt, Sigourney Weaver, John Hurt.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech and Terry travel to Miami to meet with a mechanic known as Francois; despite the interference, the brothers are determined to accomplish their American Dream.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech and Terry return to Atlanta; the brothers work together to retrieve everything they have worked hard for and plan to expand to St. Louis and other cities with Miami as a hub; Meech and Terry are in for one of their greatest adventures.

programme.title: Debug
programme.desc: While working on a derelict freighter in outer space, six young hackers fall prey to the ships artificial intelligence, a program that would kill to become human. Starring Jeananne Goossen, Adrian Holmes, Jason Momoa.

programme.title: I Am Bruce Lee
programme.desc: The amazing story of one of the greatest icons ever to enter the public consciousness, the first film to truly tell Bruce Lees story in his own words and actions. Starring Kobe Bryant, Gina Carano, Reginald Hudlin.

programme.title: Hector and the Search for Happiness
programme.desc: A search by a disillusioned psychiatrist for the key to his happiness takes him around the world on a journey. Starring Simon Pegg, Toni Collette, Rosamund Pike.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Will runs into unexpected trouble and personal revelations on a trip to the Liberian Sanctuary in Monorovia; Magnus has her hands full when a couple of flying Abnormals recruit her help with a questionable scheme.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: When a team from the UK Sanctuary gets in trouble on a stranded icebreaker in the Bering Sea, Magnus and Will must figure out who is behind the mysterious happenings at sea.

programme.title: Tom and Jerrys Giant Adventure
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry encounter a grumpy giant after climbing a beanstalk to a magical land. Starring Garrison Keillor, Paul Reubens, Grey DeLisle.

programme.title: The Games Maker
programme.desc: Ivans love of board games transports him into the competitive world of game invention. Starring Joseph Fiennes, Tom Cavanagh, Megan Charpentier.

programme.title: Bill and Ted Face the Music
programme.desc: The ruler of the future tells best friends Bill and Ted they must compose a new song to save life as we know it. But instead of writing it, they decide to travel through time to steal it from their older selves and bring harmony to the universe. Starring Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter, Kristen Schaal.

programme.title: Racetime
programme.desc: After losing a rigged sled race, Frankie challenges newcomer Zac to one last showdown. With the stakes higher than ever, Zac will stop at nothing to win the race. Starring Lucinda Davis, Noel Fisher, Angela Galuppo.

programme.title: The Boxtrolls
programme.desc: A boy (Isaac Hempstead-Wright) and his new friend (Elle Fanning) hatch a plan to save a community of mischievous cavern-dwellers from the villainous townsman (Ben Kingsley) who plans to exterminate them. Starring Isaac Hempstead-Wright, Elle Fanning, Ben Kingsley.

programme.title: Air Bud

programme.title: Kill Victoria

programme.title: Charmed to Death

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: A messy divorce leads to a woman hiding a large sum of money with one of her close friends; when the woman goes missing, her friend, Ashley, is believed to be involved in more than just attempted fraud.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: After police discovers Melinda Pleskovic dead in her home just days before her daughters wedding, police turn to her future son-in-law when his story doesnt seem to add up; he has news of his own, break-ins at the Pleskovic home reveal the culprit.

programme.desc: New couple Leon and Valerie have one unfortunate thing in common, they both hate their exes. When Leons ex-wife and Valeries ex-husband are targeted for murder, it becomes a case of he said/she said. Who hired a hitman?

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Lockdown
programme.desc: After an intruder breaks into the house, Bernie reacts by turning it into a high-security compound, driving everyone crazy with his overprotectiveness.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Mac 101
programme.desc: Bernie becomes a stern taskmaster after witnessing the childrens behavior at dinner, cracking down on Vanessa for her grades and making Bryana speak Spanish all the time.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Pool Sharks Git Bit
programme.desc: Steve and Cedric must prove their skill as pool players when Romeo and Bullethead lose school funds to some hustlers.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Coming to Chicago
programme.desc: Steve (Steve Harvey) hurts Reginas (Wendy Raquel Robinson) feelings when he has a fling with an old flame. Guest star Brian McKnight plays himself.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - African-American Me
programme.desc: Regina (Wendy Raquel Robinson) asks Steve (Steve Harvey) to back up her church choir on piano.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - When the Funk Bites the Dust
programme.desc: Steve and the Hi-Tops celebrate the engagement of Steves former road manager by throwing a bachelor party.

programme.title: The Forgettable Life of Liam White
programme.desc: An uninspired novelist begins a journey of self-reflection and reconciliation when he learns that his cancer has returned.

programme.title: NEW! Shark PowerDetect with DuoClean Detect Technology
programme.desc: Meet the new Shark PowerDetect Upright Vacuum with features like DuoClean Detect Technology, self-cleaning brush roll and odor neutralizing and you will be cleaning faster, smarter and better!

programme.title: Best Mattress Topper Ever!
programme.desc: Back Pain? Hip? Sleep well thanks to this cooling topper!

programme.title: Protect Your Family from Identity Theft
programme.desc: Every 5 seconds theres a victim of identity theft. LifeLock helps alert you, restore your identity, and reimburse lost funds-leading the way in protecting families every day.

programme.title: The Aging Brain
programme.desc: Learn whats behind mental decline with age, and how to improve memory, focus and concentration with NeuroQs Darrin Peterson and Dale Bredesen MD.

programme.title: Cindy Crawford talks about the latest breakthroughs in skincare
programme.desc: Join Cindy Crawford as she talks to real customers about the breakthrough skincare system that keeps them looking their best. Take a trip to the stunning French countryside to see the rare French melon that defies the aging process.

programme.title: Never Scrub Your Floors Again
programme.desc: See why this cleaning tool replaces chemicals and hard labor!

programme.title: Protect Your Family from Identity Theft
programme.desc: Every 5 seconds theres a victim of identity theft. LifeLock helps alert you, restore your identity, and reimburse lost funds-leading the way in protecting families every day.

programme.title: Never Scrub Your Floors Again
programme.desc: See why this cleaning tool replaces chemicals and hard labor!

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - In His Fathers Steps
programme.desc: A fathers bond with his son is unbreakable.

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - Ladies First
programme.desc: For ladies night, YoYo makes buttery and delicious lobster rolls and doesnt skimp on the meat; she then takes it up a notch with a pan-seared salmon, drizzled with a creamy pesto sauce, served with a side of sauteed broccolini.

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - Got It From My Mama Mia
programme.desc: YoYo and her mama, Mia, make stuffed bell peppers with ground beef, rice and cheddar cheese, cabbage burgers and sweet potato fries.

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - Sister Soul Brunch
programme.desc: Hip-hop legend Roxanne Shante drops by and hangs out with YoYo for some good food and good times; they reminisce over a great bowl of shrimp and grits topped with rich and creamy gravy.

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - Dinner Party at Yo-Yos Place
programme.desc: Yo-Yos recipe for a great dinner party is great people, a great vibe and great food; she serves it up in a way that only she can, laying out a tender and juicy oyster-glazed rib-eye steak, creamy mashed potatoes, and a baby arugula salad.

programme.title: For Richer or Poorer
programme.desc: Married couple Aubrey and Kya struggle to hold their relationship together when Aubrey loses his job and Kya has trouble coping with the change in their financial status.

programme.title: The Love Letter
programme.desc: An advice columnist (Keshia Knight Pulliam) uncovers her true feelings after writing an anonymous letter to herself.

programme.title: Family Time - There Goes the Neighborhood
programme.desc: Anthony, a construction worker, wins $500,000 in the lottery, enabling him to move his family to a middle-class neighborhood.

programme.title: Family Time - No Happy Ending
programme.desc: With the kids spending a few days at the grandparents house, Anthony and Lisa plan a romantic weekend at home.

programme.title: Family Time - The Note
programme.desc: Devin turns into a ladies man after taking advice from Anthony.

programme.title: Family Time - The Tennis Bracelet
programme.desc: After Anthony purchases a diamond tennis bracelet for his mothers 65th birthday, him and Lisa argue about who he loves more.

programme.title: Family Time - When a Womans Fed Up
programme.desc: After being neglectful and spending too much time in his man cave, Anthony worries that Lisa might stray from the marriage.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Manchild in Vanessa Land
programme.desc: Bernie learns Vanessa has a boyfriend, Rahim, who is 18 years old; when he discovers that the teen has a child, he hits the ceiling.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - You Dont Know Squad
programme.desc: Vanessa tries to increase her chances of being accepted into a college by joining the drill team, which pleases Bernie until he sees one of the squads provocative routines.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - You Got Served
programme.desc: Bernie is sued for being a negligent parent after a birthday bash for Bryana results in broken bones.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - I Dont Wanna Be a Playa No More
programme.desc: When Jordan develops a crush on a girl at school, Bernie takes it upon himself to teach Jordan how to be a player and get the girl.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - The Big Picture
programme.desc: Jordans prank anonymous phone calls have surprising consequences.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Party of Five
programme.desc: Steve signs up gorgeous twins (Rosey and Renee Tenison) to replace Cedric and Lovita as his roommates.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Hes Gotta Have It
programme.desc: Steve and Regina clash when they share an office; Cedric loses his sex drive after a computer program predicts that his and Lovitas child will be ugly.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Little Stevie Blunder
programme.desc: Steve (Steve Harvey) woos a beautiful woman (guest star Kellita Smith) by pretending to be blind; Lovita (Terri J. Vaughn) discovers Cedrics (Cedric The Entertainer) secret locked box.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Roomies
programme.desc: Regina (Wendy Raquel Robinson) drives Steve (Steve Harvey) buggy when she moves in with him while her apartment is being fumigated.

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - Adapt to Survive
programme.desc: Showcasing how uncertainty can be downright terrifying.

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - Its in the Family
programme.desc: Exploring family relationships, both the loving and the difficult.

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - The Weight of Grief
programme.desc: Loss is never easy, but exploring the impact of grief is necessary.

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - Fading Youth
programme.desc: Exploring how regardless of the situation, the events of ones youth are defining.

programme.title: In the Meantime
programme.desc: Soon to be married, a bride (Kali Hawk) finds that her friendship with a fellow volunteer (Darrin Dewitt Henson) at an adult-literacy program is developing into something much more intense.

programme.title: Best Mattress Topper Ever!
programme.desc: Back Pain? Hip? Sleep well thanks to this cooling topper!

programme.desc: The owner of a barbershop faces pressure from a corporation that is opening establishments in his neighborhood.

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations (2003)

programme.title: A House on the Bayou (2021)
programme.desc: Hoping for an idyllic getaway, a couple and their daughter visit a remote mansion in rural Louisiana. When suspiciously friendly neighbors show up uninvited, the weekend soon takes a sinister turn as dark secrets test the familys fragile bond.

programme.title: The Hillside Strangler
programme.sub-title: The Many Faces of Ken Bianchi
programme.desc: Detectives link two killings in Bellingham, WA, to Ken Bianchi, exposing him as the Hillside Strangler; facing death row, he claims amnesia and submits to hypnosis; decades later, Bianchi argues his murderous confessions were fabricated.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: With a biting wit and brutal honesty, Kelsey Cook covers the gamut, from Brazilian waxing to career advice from her parents; rising comedian Kiry Shabazz theorizes about how a doctors note is much more valuable than the constitution.

programme.title: Navy SEALS (1990)

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks (2003)
programme.desc: Recruited by the CIA, a teen works under cover to befriend a girl whose father unknowingly works for an evil organization.

programme.title: French Girl (2024)

programme.desc: Brothers-in-arms Orion Pax and D-16 become sworn enemies Optimus Prime and Megatron.

programme.title: Orange County (2002)
programme.desc: A high schooler (Colin Hanks) tries to fix a mistake after his guidance counselor sends the wrong papers to Stanford University.

programme.sub-title: An Inconvenient Sequel: Truth to Power (2017)
programme.desc: Former Vice President Al Gore continues his tireless fight, traveling around the world to train an army of activists and influence international climate policy.

programme.title: Rivers Edge (1987)
programme.desc: Small-town teens (Crispin Glover, Keanu Reeves) react oddly after a peer strangles his girlfriend and shows them the corpse.

programme.title: The Pope of Greenwich Village (1984)
programme.desc: Two cousins (Eric Roberts, Mickey Rourke) try to get rich quick with a racehorse and mob money in New Yorks Little Italy.

programme.title: Cast Away (2000)
programme.desc: A corporate troubleshooter survives a plane crash to spend five years seeking out an existence on a deserted island before returning to civilization with an altered view of his old life and values.

programme.title: Novocaine (2025)
programme.desc: When the girl of his dreams gets kidnapped, a man turns his inability to feel pain into an unexpected advantage. He fights a bunch of thugs to get her back.

programme.title: Road to Perdition (2002)
programme.desc: Accompanied by his eldest son, a Depression-era mob enforcer (Tom Hanks) seeks revenge after the rest of his family are murdered by his employers (Paul Newman) jealous son.

programme.title: Event Horizon (1997)
programme.desc: A spaceship missing for seven years finally re-emerges and sends out a distress signal. But when a team is sent out to investigate, they discover that something sinister has taken over the craft.

programme.title: The Martian (2015)
programme.desc: Left behind by his crew, a stranded astronaut must find a way to survive on Mars, while NASA and a team of international scientists work tirelessly to bring him home.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men (2007)
programme.desc: An aging lawman (Tommy Lee Jones) reflects on his past and laments a changing world while trying to find and protect a hunter who took the cash from a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: Switchback (1997)
programme.desc: A college student (Jared Leto) and a former rail worker (Danny Glover) are suspects in an FBI agents (Dennis Quaid) hunt for a serial killer who abducted his son.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A law-school grad uncovers a sinister secret about the Tennessee firm that made him an offer he couldnt refuse.

programme.title: Fighting (2009)
programme.desc: A scam artist (Terrence Howard) introduces a young man (Channing Tatum) to New Yorks bare-knuckle street-fighting circuit.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray (2014)
programme.desc: A female guard (Kristen Stewart) at Guantanamo Bay forms an unlikely friendship with one of the facilitys longtime detainees.

programme.title: Patriots Day (2016)
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombings, police Sgt. Tommy Saunders, FBI Special Agent Richard DesLauriers and Commissioner Ed Davis join survivors, first responders and other investigators in a race against time to find the suspects.

programme.title: Silence (2016)
programme.desc: Two 17th-century Portuguese missionaries (Andrew Garfield, Adam Driver) face the ultimate test of faith when they travel to Japan to find their missing mentor (Liam Neeson).

programme.title: Gangs of New York (2002)
programme.desc: During the era of Tammany Halls sway, a young man (Leonardo DiCaprio) vows vengeance on the vicious gangster (Daniel Day-Lewis) who killed his father.

programme.title: Trading Places (1983)
programme.desc: Sporting billionaire brothers reverse the roles of a Wall Street commodities broker (Dan Aykroyd) and a street hustler (Eddie Murphy).

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: Everybody Wants Some!! (2016)
programme.desc: In 1980 Texas, a college freshman (Blake Jenner) meets his new baseball teammates (Will Brittain, Ryan Guzman), an unruly group of disco-dancing, skirt-chasing partyers.

programme.title: College (2008)
programme.desc: Three high-school seniors (Drake Bell, Andrew Caldwell, Kevin Covais) spend a wild weekend with members of Fairmont Universitys rowdiest fraternity.

programme.title: Jackass: Number Two (2006)
programme.desc: Daredevils go for the gross-out when they subject an unsuspecting public to more outrageous stunts and practical jokes.

programme.desc: Desperado brothers (George Clooney, Quentin Tarantino) kidnap a preacher (Harvey Keitel) and his kids, commandeer their RV and wind up in a Mexican strip joint where vampires lurk.

programme.desc: Strange occurrences plague a small-town detective and his family as he investigates the disappearance of a boy.

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact (1996)
programme.desc: Picard (Patrick Stewart), Riker (Jonathan Frakes) and the others set off to stop the half-robot Borg from sabotaging the first warp drive flight in 2063.

programme.title: Witness (1985)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II (2000)
programme.desc: IMF agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called Chimera.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III (2006)
programme.desc: Now a trainer for IMF recruits, agent Ethan Hunt squares off against the toughest foe he has ever faced, a ruthless arms and information broker.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible -- Ghost Protocol (2011)
programme.desc: The IMF is shut down when its implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organizations name.

programme.desc: The sheriff (Sylvester Stallone) of a small New Jersey police community confronts key men (Harvey Keitel, Ray Liotta) on both sides of a law-enforcement cover-up.

programme.title: Gone Baby Gone (2007)
programme.desc: Two private investigators (Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan) tread dangerous ground as they scour the Boston underworld for a kidnapped child.

programme.title: Lust and Redemption (2023)
programme.desc: A ranch owner named Samantha rejects an offer from a rich land developer, but her daughter falls for the developers hot son. A surprising discovery is made as help comes from an unexpected source.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa (2013)

programme.desc: Nitwits (Johnny Knoxville, Bam Margera, Chris Pontius) perform outrageous stunts and pull practical jokes on an unsuspecting public.

programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi captures a snapshot of America as the country faces a pandemic, a presidential election and a costly financial collapse.

programme.desc: The crew (Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner) of the Enterprise must prevent a replica of Capt. Picard (Patrick Stewart) from overtaking Earth.

programme.desc: After receiving a lump of coal in his stocking, a disgruntled 12-year-old hires a highly skilled assassin to kill Santa Claus.

programme.desc: God chooses Noah (Russell Crowe) to build an ark and save the animals and his family from an apocalyptic flood.

programme.title: Before Dawn (2024)
